=== [About Lifestack]
Introducing Lifestack: Your Personalized Energy Calendar! Seamlessly blending health data from your wearables and smartphones, Lifestack revolutionizes your scheduling experience by prioritizing your energy levels. Say goodbye to burnout and hello to peak productivity as Lifestack optimizes your day based on your unique energy patterns. Whether it's scheduling workouts during your peak energy hours or planning relaxation during downtime, Lifestack empowers you to live in sync with your body's natural rhythms. Take control of your time and energy with Lifestack today!

=== [About Lifestack Extension]
Lifestack Extension makes it simple to monitor your energy levels on your desktop by seamlessly integrating into your Google Calendar, enabling you to schedule your day more effectively.

=== [How to use]
### 1. Install the mobile app first

To make use of the Lifestack Extension, it's essential to have the Lifestack mobile app installed and to connect your data within it.

[iOS]: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/lifestack-calendar-and-health/id6473464429
[Android]: https://play.google.com/store/search?q=lifestack&c=apps

### 2. Sync your data
To access the most up-to-date data on the extension, open the mobile app. The Chrome extension will then synchronize automatically.

### 3. Schedule your days with energy in mind
Try to schedule most demanding tasks in your high energy times, and easy tasks in your low energy times.

=== [Current restrictions]
### Supported calendars

- Google Calendar
    - Day View
    - Week View
    - Custom-Day View

- Outlook Calendar
    - WorkWeek View
    - Week View
    - Day View (except 1-day view)
